references: Related: CF 220543; Repeals: Ord 80891; Supersedes: Ord 81500
summary: An ordinance establishing a Code Research Division in the Building Department; authorizing the employment under contract of a Code Research Director; making an appropriation from the Emergency Fund in connection therewith and declaring the emergency therefor; repealing Ordinance No. 80891 and abolishing the position of "Legislative Analyst" created by Ordinance No. 81500.
